author: CBC News
title: What it's like without internet during the COVID-19 pandemic
description: With governments urging people to stay home and use the internet to stay connected during the COVID-19 pandemic, it's worth noting that not everyone has the benefit of space and a portal to the web.
content:
As governments urge people to stay connected online during the COVID-19 pandemic  rather than in person  low-income Ottawans like Chris Prefontaine don't have that luxury.
Prefontaine, 37, is stuck in a small Caldwell Avenue apartment with a blocked-off balc… [+1962 chars]
